page.title: 02Why live in Tuffley?
page.content: A number of people were asked what they found particularly attractive about the area. By far the commonest reasons for liking Tuffley are: the handiness of amenities, being close to the city and to the countryside at the same time, and being a quiet, friendly area with a community spirit. The amenities referred to, were listed as good schools for all ages from 5 to 18, adequate shops, sports centre, dentists, good bus services and good housing. Other features which are appreciated are Robinswood Hill and the absence of pollution. On the other hand, concern is felt about the poor state of repair of the roads and footpaths, the increasing volume and speed of traffic and the apparent lack of activities for young people.
